label: 玄番寮
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the ritsuryô Bureau for Alien and Buddhist Affairs, which was overseen by the Ministry of Civil Affairs (Jibushô). Its mandate was to oversee Buddhist affairs as well as matters associated with immigrants and foreign emissaries. [律令] [治部省]
